namespaces.namespace: The NModule.Core namespace contains basic helper classes and interfaces.
The NModule.Core.Loader namespace contains the classes that facilitate module loading, registration, and unloading.
The NModule.Core.Module namespace contains helper classes and facilities to identify modules.
The NModule.Dependency.Core namespace contains the core classes that represent various pieces of a dependency tree.
The NModule.Dependency.Resolver namespace contains the depedency resolver classes and exceptions used for dependency resolution.
